channel.title: Markdown on Timi's RStudio Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Timi's RStudio Tutorials

item.title: Barplot
item.description: Bringing in the Libraries library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) library(devtools) Extracting the data query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) Visualizing the data ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity',color='blue',fill='white')+ coord_flip()+ ylab('Homeruns')+ xlab('Team')+ ggtitle('1980 Team Homerun Distribution') result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name)

item.title: Scatterplot
item.description: Bringing in the Libraries library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) library(devtools) Extracting the data query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS Career_HR,sum(SO) AS Career_SO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) Visualizing the data ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=Career_SO,y=Career_HR),size=3,color="blue")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts VS Homeruns for Great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns")

item.title: Time Series
item.description: Bringing in the Libraries library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) library(devtools) Extracting the data query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) Visualizing the data ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Through Years")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Homeruns")

item.title: Histogram
item.description: Bringing in the Libraries library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) library(devtools) Extracting the Data query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) Viualizing the Data ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="white",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body-Weight Distribution for Baseball Players")
